protocol.name: P-G18153-1
protocol.text: Seedlings were germinated on semi-solid ATS media with or without 30% 2H2O and grown under continuous light at 22±2℃.

protocol.name: P-G18153-2
protocol.text: Seedlings were collected and frozen in liquid nitrogen immediately.  Seedlings were ground to powder under liquid nitrogen just before total RNA isolation.

protocol.name: P-G18153-3
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-G18153-4
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with RMA using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method.

protocol.name: P-G18153-5
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using the RNeasy plant mini kit (Qiagen), following the manufacturer’s instructions.
